== Description ==
Installs an empty blog at the specified id with an optionally specified title.

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$blog_id|integer|The id of the blog to be installed.}}
{{Parameter|$blog_title|string|The title of the new blog|optional|[blank string]}}

== Return Values ==
; <tt>(null)</tt>

== Usage ==
%%%<?php install_blog($blog_id, $blog_title); ?>%%%
